name: superscript
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share expression with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

1e Le domaine viticole de la Vigne Blanche

Sample text for testing:1ère
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com1ère	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
author: avarx
